root.text: I think I don't wanna be a cop any more

then.text: "Get a hold of yourself." You feel the lieutenant pat you on your back, rhythmically.
"I've seen strong men turn themselves inside out for hours. You're facing tough odds here. Alcohol withdrawal makes it considerably harder."
WHAT IS HAPPENING TO YOU?!?! Are you going to CRY now, son?
You heard the coach! This is weakness. It cannot go on much longer, or you will LOSE.

choices.text: "Do it without me. I just can't keep it down."
